page.title: 02Waltham St Lawrence Village
page.content:
{Waltham St Lawrence}is a small village in the Thames Valley. It has one main street with three small side roads off it. There is a Post Office, a general store and an agricultural supplier in the village.
The village has two pubs, The Bell and The Star, a village hall and another hall for meetings, a church and a petrol station.
The houses down the main street are mainly old houses built before 1900 while on the outskirts of the village most of the houses are much smaller and were built after 1900. Apart from some council houses there are very few modern houses built in the village.
